display_name: Does the participant have obstructive sleep apnea?
description: Defined as having both; (1) Obstructive apnea index(OAI) greater than or equal to 1 or Apnea hyponea index (AHI) greater than or equal to two, confirmed on nocturnal laboratory-based PSG and (2) parental report of habitual snoring (on average occurring more than 3 nights per week)
